description:
**Tool Overview**:

The updated sub-processors list is an essential resource that identifies the current sub-processors utilized to deliver products and services effectively while maintaining compliance with industry standards and best practices.

**Details**:

This document serves to inform business partners of the changes made to the sub-processors engaged in providing these services. It helps organizations understand who they are partnering with, ensuring transparency and operational excellence in business processes. The updated list is a reference point and does not require any action from users, enabling businesses to seamlessly continue utilizing their accounts without interruption.

1. The list is updated periodically to reflect changes in sub-processors.
2. It supports compliance with relevant industry standards.
3. The document is accessible to business partners for review at any time.

**Usage Example**:

To view the latest sub-processors list, business partners can access it through the provided link. Regular checks of this document are encouraged to stay informed of any changes that may affect their service delivery.
